about: My name is Jay-donn Hendricks, and I am an aspiring developer currently studying to become a junior developer in the tech industry. My journey began at the age of 7 when I first explored a computer. I was fascinated by its inner workings and the components it was made of, igniting my passion for technology. This fascination led me to start building my own computers at the age of 10.My love for coding grew during the times when I had to update software. Delving deeper into understanding software functionality changed my perception of how profoundly it influences the entire computer, from programs to games. Now, I am dedicated to pursuing my dreams, aiming to become the best version of myself. I aspire to create new technologies and software that will revolutionize the world as we know it, benefiting both myself and others.

resume.description: I got my certificates on my 1st module: Facilitation
I got my certificates on my 2nd module: Team Work
I got my certificates on my 3rd module: Project Management
I got my certificate on First Aid

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have a decade of experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JQuery, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Database
skills.experience: I've have been working on different types of databases since 2009, both SQL-structured and document-based. I enjoy working on a database; for me, that is where the magic happens. A well-structured database is the result of data integrity and many more.

skills.title: API
skills.experience: In case we want to secure, identify, and authorize access to a user on a specific resource, we need to have an API, which is a glue between the front end and back end. We can set up a lot of features or logic, such as middleware, database configuration, JSON web tokens, and many more. For the past 7 years, I have been working on APIs using Django and ExpressJS.

skills.title: Programming
skills.experience: When it comes to programming, I have a lot to say, but I will be brief. Programming and database management are the skills that will stay with me forever, even though it is my first time to come across another programming language. It is crazy how I knew it syntax before starting coding. I have a decade of working experience on the following programming languages: C++, Python, Delphi, Javascript, VB.Net, C#, and Java. I still want to learn more about them.

testimonials.quotes: Joel never ceases to amaze me with the vast amount of knowledge he has acquired over the years in software development. He is truly a great mentor.
Joel is a nice person. Someone who is really reliable and honest always does his work and makes sure everything is well organized.

Joel Tshimanga Mukunya is an incredibly humble intellectual. He is an outstanding lecturer who consistently finds effective ways to ensure that everyone comprehends the content. Additionally, he has a delightful personality, making him a joy to be around.

I am thrilled to share my heartfelt testimonial for Joel, a remarkable former co-worker and lecturer. Joel worked under my guidance for one year during my time as Head of Curriculum and Learning at Lifechoices Academy. His expertise in C++, HTML, CSS, Vue.js, JavaScript, and Node.js is truly impressive, and he effortlessly demonstrates proficiency in these technologies. However, what truly sets Joel apart is his exceptional teaching skills. He has a natural talent for breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible bits, making the learning process enjoyable and engaging. Joel's patience and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure every student grasps the material are truly commendable. I consider myself fortunate to have learned from him, and I wholeheartedly recommend him as an outstanding educator.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: I built this application using HTML 5, CSS, and Javascript.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: Message believers Circle
projects.description: MBC is an application I built for my client for selling products online. I make use of Vue3 JS, MySQL, APIs, and JSON Web Tokens.

projects.name: JT Laptop
projects.description: An eCommerce site built using HTML 5, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap 5

projects.name: JS Portfolio
